[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/foundation-forms](./foundation-forms.md) &gt; [Form](./foundation-forms.form.md) &gt; [renderers](./foundation-forms.form.renderers.md)

## Form.renderers property

Allows to provide the main set of renderers used by the form. If not provided, the built-in renderers will be used by default.

**Signature:**

```typescript
renderers: RendererEntry[];
```
